name: Paper Lily - Chapter 1
description:
Something terrible has happened. You can’t bear to think about it - but you can’t live like this anymore. You stopped attending school, you haven’t left your house in months, you have no reason to get out of bed anymore. There are no choices left.

No choice except... that strange golden letter.

It’s time to get your life back together.

One last try.



Paper Lily is a story-driven, psychological horror RPG where each puzzle has multiple solutions and outcomes. There is always another way.
Follow Lacie's story as you explore a dangerous hidden world, solve puzzles in multiple different ways, and face strange enemies. The game is playable in about 4 hours and contains multiple endings depending on your actions.

Paper Lily - Chapter 1 is the continuation to the prologue, Project Kat, but it can also be enjoyed without having played it.

Out of Context Features



  • Multiple ways of solving puzzles!
  • Touch grass, and trees
  • Minigames where you press buttons and push boxes around
  • Call your mother
  • Harmless Snack™
  • Various things made of paper
  • Bunnies (or whatever those things are)
  • Demons
  • Fast demons
  • Social anxiety simulation
  • Table salt
  • ...Is that Kat? Nah, probably not
  • Bathroom etiquette
  • Death
